name: PoemGenie
0:
caret
”Alexa, open Poem Genie.”
”create a poem about a beloved husky named luna.”
”make me a poem about a battleship made of cheese.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: poem genie
Developer Terms of Use
des: Introducing our Alexa skill that helps you unleash your inner poet! With our skill, you can easily generate personalized poems on a variety of topics, ranging from love and friendship to nature and nostalgia. Simply tell Alexa what type of poem you'd like to create and she'll do the rest, using advanced language processing capabilities to craft a unique and beautiful poem just for you. Whether you're a seasoned poet or just looking for a fun and creative outlet, our Alexa skill is the perfect tool for expressing yourself in verse. Try it out today and discover the power of poetry!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
